misconceptions.inferred_category_name: No misconception detected (correct nested-loop pattern generation)
misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes that using an outer loop for rows (1..N) and an inner loop for columns (1..row) will print 1 star on the first row, increasing by one each row, up to N stars on the last row.
misconceptions.conceptual_gap: No gap: this matches Java’s execution model for nested loops and console output. The inner loop prints the correct number of asterisks per row, and the newline after each row produces the triangle shape.
misconceptions.error_manifestation: None (produces correct output for valid positive N).
